queries.description: Do not modify constant objects. This may result in undefined behavior.
queries.name: Do not modify constant objects

implementation_scope.description: The implementation does not consider pointer aliasing via multiple indirection.

queries.description: The function argument corresponding to an array parameter shall have an appropriate number of elements.
queries.name: An array founction argument shall have an appropriate number of elements

RULE-17-5.title: The function argument corresponding to an array parameter shall have an appropriate number of elements

queries.description: The value returned by a function having non-void return type shall be used or cast to void.
queries.name: Return values should be used or cast to void

RULE-17-7.title: The value returned by a function having non-void return type shall be used or cast to void
